title: Part One: The Bastard Who Invented Homeopathy
itunes:title: Part One: The Bastard Who Invented Homeopathy
description:
In Episode 91, Robert is joined by Billy Wayne Davis, to discuss the baby-killing horror of homeopathy.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Hundreds of Babies Harmed by Homeopathic Remedies, Families Say
  2. Penelope Dingle's letters to Francine Scrayen
  3. Cancer victim Penelope Dingle 'in awe of homeopath' - husband
  4. Belief in Homeopathy Results in the Death of a 7-Year-Old Italian Child
  5. Antibiotic overprescribing: Still a major concern.
  6. Anticholinergic Toxicity Secondary to Overuse of Topricin Cream, a Homeopathic Medication
  7. Homeopathic Pain Medicine Contains Poison
  8. FDA confirms elevated levels of belladonna in certain homeopathic teething products
  9. Hyland's
  10. FDA warns against the use of homeopathic teething tablets and gels
  11. On the ethics of clinical trials of homeopathy in Third World countries
  12. Evaluation of healing wound and genotoxicity potentials from extracts hydroalcoholic of Plantago major and Siparuna guianensis.
  13. Homeopathy
  14. THE BASIS OF HOMEOPATHY
  15. Inventing the randomized double-blind trial: the Nuremberg salt test of 1835
  16. Homeopathy And Its Founder: Views Of A British Researcher
  17. Samuel Hahnemann : his life and work

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
